docs.title: Who is Bruno Ribeiro
docs.text: Hello, my name is Bruno Ribeiro. I currently live in Foz do Iguaçu-Brazil, known as the Land of Waterfalls and Destination of the World. I have extensive experience in IT, currently working as a software developer specializing in computer vision. My skills include Python development, machine learning, the Internet of Things and agile methodologies.
